An attack right after a Dash is duplicated by a clone
Damage +{Asset.AliasValue1}% for every 100 Shells you have (Currently: +{Asset.AliasValue0FocusedPlayer}%).
Weapons' direct hits create a Blast which deals {Asset.Value0}% of the initial hit's damage.
Replicate {Asset.Value0}% of the damage dealt after {Asset.AliasValue0}s. Any new damage resets the effect.

Health Flasks activate a Lifesteal effect that heals the team ({Asset.Value0}% of the Base Damage for {Asset.AliasValue0}s).
You can Recover 100% of lost Health for {Asset.Value0Abs}% longer, and Trinkets can trigger this effect.
Gain a Health Flask that refills with {Asset.Value1F}% of your Base Damage.
Burn damage rate +{Asset.Value0}% for the team, and duration +{Asset.Value1}%.
Killing a foe with Burn creates a fireball that repeatedly applies 1 Burn ({Asset.DPSAlias01FTD} DPS for {Asset.AliasValue2}s).
Killing a foe with Final Curse applies 10 Curses to all nearby targets (+{Asset.AliasValue0}% each).
{Asset.Value0}% of the damage you deal to a target with Final Curse is also dealt to all other targets with Final Curse.
If the held jump hits, gain an <tooltip=opportunity>Opportunity</tooltip> to launch a stronger one.
Projectiles bounce twice, and each bounce deals +{Asset.Value1}% damage

Every Crystallize increases your damage by {Asset.AliasValue1}% for the rest of the expedition
(Currently: {Asset.AliasValue0}%).
Performing a Dodge activates Lifesteal for {Asset.AliasValue0}s (can heal you up to {Asset.AliasValue1}% of your max health).
Kills create an explosion that stuns for {Asset.AliasValue0FrameToDuration}s.
Your first hit against a target deals +{Asset.Value0}% damage.
Your hits heal for {Asset.Value2}% of Base Damage, but maximum Health {Asset.Value1}%.
Randomly Mark a nearby foe every {Asset.AliasValue0}s ({Asset.Value0} damage).
Saves you from death ONCE and heals you for {Asset.Value0}%. Cannot be replaced.
Effects triggered by killing foes also trigger when they reach {Asset.Value0}% Health.
When hit, lose {Asset.Value0} Â Shells for each point of damage instead of Health.
Damage +{Asset.AliasValue0}% for every Maximum Health point above your starting total (Currently: +{Asset.CurrentMaxHealthBonusDmg}%).
Triggers another Alterattack after the 1st one, but with {Asset.Value0}% damage.
Damage +{Asset.AliasValue0}% for every percent of missing health (Currently: +{Asset.CurrentBerserkBonusDmg}%).
Block and <tooltip=parry>Parry</tooltip> create an ethereal blade.
Deals damage around you when the trinket is ready
Foes killed by Crystallize give {Asset.Value0} Shells.
Burn max stacks +{Asset.Value0} for the team, and damage +{Asset.Value1}% for each {Asset.AliasValue0} stack.
Echo also damages nearby foes for {Asset.Value0}% of the original damage.
When hit, gain Brutality and {Asset.Value1}% damage taken for {Asset.AliasValue0}s.
When hit, creates an explosion that stuns for {Asset.AliasValue0FrameToDuration}s and deals {Asset.Value0}% of the damage.
You are immune to stuns. Kills reduce damage taken by {Asset.Value1Abs}% for {Asset.AliasValue0}s.
Brutality bonus damage +{Asset.Value0}% every second it's active (up to a total of {Asset.AliasValue0}%).
Using a Trinket spawns a Scythe ({Asset.DPS00FTD} DPS for {Asset.SpecialOtherValue0FTD}s).
Adds +{Asset.Value0}% damage to the first hit against a target
Deals damage over time in an area ({Asset.DPS00FTD} DPS)
Perfect timing is handled automatically, but damage {Asset.Value0}%
Direct hits create a <tooltip=blast>Blast</tooltip> which deals {Asset.Value0}% of the initial hit's damage.
Directly applies <tooltip=finalcurse>Final Curse</tooltip>, but no longer deals damage.
Using a Trinket makes your next action deal Criticals.
Each hit against the same target adds {Asset.Value0}% damage
Held attack hits launch an <tooltip=finalswitch>Alterattack</tooltip> signal (Cooldown: {Asset.Value0FrameToDuration}s).
Kills have a {Asset.Value0}% chance to permanently increase gear damage by {Asset.Value1}% (Currently: +{Asset.GearPermDmg}%).
Heals you for {Asset.Value0}% of base damage dealt (while under 50% health)
Weapon and Trinket damage +{Asset.Value0}% while near to your target.
Weapon hits are replicated, dealing {Asset.Value0}% of the original damage.
Weapon and Trinket damage +{Asset.Value0}% if there are no enemies near you.
Ignore the first hit in each Biome and become invincible for {Asset.Value0}s.
Effects triggered by killing foes also trigger for each {Asset.Value0}% Health lost by Minibosses, and {Asset.Value1}% Health lost by Bosses.
Scythe duration is increased by {Asset.Value0F}% of your Base Damage.
Scythes merge and combine their duration and damage. Scythe damage +{Asset.Value0}%, with an additional {Asset.Value1}% for each one merged (up to {Asset.AliasValue0} merges).
Kills launch projectiles, applying {Asset.AliasValue2Plus1} Burn to all nearby targets ({Asset.DPSAlias01FTD} DPS for {Asset.AliasValue3}s each).
<tooltip=burninfusion>Burn Infusion</tooltip> adds a 2<sup>nd</sup> stack, dealing {Asset.Value0}% of the original damage.
Using a Trinket marks all nearby foes ({Asset.Value0} damage).
Dashing through a foe marks it ({Asset.AliasValue0} damage).
When you unleash a Mark, launch an Alterattack signal (Cooldown: {Asset.AliasValue0}s).
When the team unleashes a Mark, damage nearby foes for {Asset.Value0}% of the original damage (stackable).
2 Marks merge into a stronger one that deals +{Asset.Value0}% damage (stackable as a team).
The team's Curses reduce foe damage by {Asset.AliasValue0}% per stack, and by 40% during Final Curse.
When Final Curse is triggered, gain an Opportunity to stun every target with a Final Curse for {Asset.AliasValue0FrameToDuration}s.
Blast size +{Asset.Value0P}%, and damage +{Asset.Value1}% against foes beyond the initial target.
Weapons' direct Criticals create a Blast which deals {Asset.Value0}% of the initial hit's damage.
Shattering Freeze deals +{Asset.Value0}% damage and explodes around the target.
After being shattered, the team's Freezes stay active for {Asset.AliasValue0}s.
Weapons refill your Trinkets depending on their damage. The amount increases exponentially through Base Damage, up to {Asset.AliasValue0}s.
Elites, Minibosses, and Bosses drop a Boost when slain.
Bleed applications +{Asset.Value0}, and +{Asset.Value1} max stacks for the team.
Your Bleed deals +{Asset.Value0}% damage at max stacks.
Attack Speed +{Asset.Value1}%, but your Weapons and Trinkets deal {Asset.Value0}% total damage.
Left Trinket damage +{Asset.Value1}%, but Right Trinket damage {Asset.Value2}%. Slots can't be switched during combat.
Left Weapon damage +{Asset.Value1}%, but Right Weapon damage {Asset.Value2}%. Slots can't be switched during combat.
Gain {Asset.Value2} Shield, but maximum Health {Asset.Value1}%. Cannot be replaced.
Your hits heal for {Asset.Value1}% of your Base Damage, but Dash cooldown +{Asset.Value0}%.
Damage +{Asset.Value0Abs}% during future Biomes, but damage {Asset.Value0}% during the current one. Cannot be replaced.
Damage +{Asset.Value0}% during the current Biome, but damage -{Asset.Value0}% during all future ones. Cannot be replaced.
Every {Asset.SpecialRequiredDmg0} Base Damage you deal, spawn a Scythe ({Asset.DPS00FTD} DPS for {Asset.SpecialOtherValue0FTD}s).
Your 1st Alterattack is considered Chained, but all Alterattacks deal {Asset.Value0P}% damage.
When you unleash a Mark, it hits a 2nd time for {Asset.Value0}% of the original damage.

Congratulations on surviving this far! Thank you for playing our little appetizer. If you've enjoyed the experience and want to support us, then be sure to add Windblown to your Steam wishlist right now! It means a lot to us. And hey, it also helps our supposed friend, the "recommendation algorithm." See you on October 24th for the Early Access launch, where more characters, weapons, challenges, and special powers await you, not to mention co-op, so get ready to leap into the vortex with your friends!
If you liked it, please wishlist on Â Steam

You've conquered the storm... for now! Thank you for diving into the whirlwind of Windblown Early Access! If you've had a blast, please consider leaving a review or sharing the game with your friends. It helps us out a lot! And remember, the storm is just getting started. The horizon is full of promise, so look out for future updates. We're listening closely to your feedback, and with your support, we'll make the vortex even more chaotic and fun! See you soon for the next wave of the stormâit's going to be wild! Motion Twin

We used to be like you.[pause .1.5/] [wh]If I remember correctly...[/wh]
[pause .2/]But[sl]...[/sl][pause .2/] Things didn't end well[sl]...[/sl]
Seems to be broken. [pause .2/]A shred of memory haunting this[sl]...[/sl][pause .5/] Mineral?
If you like,[pause .2/] we can help you leave this cursed place.
We can share what's left of us with you!
But hey! [pause .2/]It's better than being trapped here forever if you ask me!
You can only absorb one of us.
Don't listen to them,[pause .5/] take the one that will help you the most.

Ah![pause .5/] Ahem...[pause .2/] 
Another new recruit to train, then!

Give them time to get over their emotions...[pause .2/]
They've only just come back to life!
Getting killed isn't easy to digest! [w]Haha![/w]
My name is Eperin, head of the village and the Leapers Guild.
You seem to have fully recovered.
Our Macaba sure knows how to work miracles in the infirmary.
See that thing you're wearing on your back? It's a Pulsor.
I don't know where you got it, but...
It's linked to your soul. It's what allows you to come back to life here on the Ark.
Only those linked to a Pulsor have the privilege of becoming a Leaper.
The Leapers, first and foremost, are here to help the people of the Ark.
They bring back precious resources, such as Cogs, found on the Vortex Sentinels.
If you show willingness to help the Ark's inhabitants, I'll make you [w]a new recruit![/w]
For starters, can you see Cuprik to the west?
Apparently, one of my apprentices brought him a Sentinel Golem.
Don't worry, it's totally harmless, but we can't get it to work.
If you make it, you'll be one of us! What do you say?
[wh](At worst, you'll be working with Macaba...)[/wh]
Before you go, take this Flask. It might come in handy.
Cuprik and the Sentinel Golem are west of here, so you can't miss it.
So, have you gone to see the broken Sentinel Golem?
Thanks to your efforts, we'll be able to improve life on the Ark.
Back so soon? Let's see what you've brought back.
Do we have enough Cogs? [pause .3/]Of course not!
I know. Going back to the Ark makes you want to puke, but at least you're alive (again)!
Have you got something for me?
I'm in charge of restoring all the Ark's broken things, but this damn Golem resists me...
I've tried everything, but it seems to be missing a vital component. Perhaps you can find it in the Vortex.
All you have to do is seek the same model and grab the part in question.
I'm very curious to see what this Golem is all about...
You'll have to go into the Vortex to get that, kid.
[wh]And if I hit it on the head...[/wh]
Holy scallops, this Golem can really help us then?
Someone move the training dummy at the other end of the Arch again!
I'd love to tinker with your Pulsor, [pause .2/]but Eperin would disapprove. [pause .2/]Pfff!
Where did I put my pliers...
Strike while the iron is hot!
Now all you have to do is set off on an expedition to find the missing piece.
I bet they gave you your first mission after you got blasted by the Vortex! [pause .2/][w]LOL![/w]
And what's more, you don't even know how to use the cannon! [sl]ROFLMAO[/sl]!
It's [w]soooo[/w] simple.[pause .2/] You just have to get into it!
But seeing as you only have two brain celâ
[s]ALARM![/s] Please do not destroy me. BF-43V3R is a pacifist model.
Please have a [w]friendly[/w] attitude when using BF-43V3R.
We hope we have met your expectations...
[color=757575]*BF-43V3R seems to be out of order*[/c]
I see you didn't come back empty-handed.[pause .5/] Take this to the broken golem!
So, you found a way to repair the Sentinel Golem?
All right! Now we can fix this piece of junk!
[color=757575]*Give the Ventricore to the Sentinel Golem*[/c]
_DRYING OF THE OCULAR DEVICE IN PROGRESS_
Hello.[pause .2/] My name is FREND-43V3R.[pause/] I'm your personal Encrypted Memories decryptor.
I decode these Encrypted Memories and send them to the Pillars inside the Vortex.
Once decrypted, [pause .2/]you can find them using our Memory Pillars.
[color=df5003][f]_Excessive use of Memories is dangerous for your health_[/f][/c]
Warning[/c],[pause .5/] decrypting requires Â Â Memonites. [color=df5003][f]_Material not included_[/f][/c]
To thank you for your trust, [pause .2/]we're giving you your first decrypted souvenir: a Beatbolt!
A [w]unique[/w] fusion between precision crossbow and thrilling rhythm game.
We hope we have met all your expectations. [pause .5/]Please consider giving us [color=d9a810]5 stars[/c] on[sl]...[/sl]
[w]Tip:[/w] an unlocked Memory is one more Memory to meet!
Have you encountered the [w]Memories[/w] I've unlocked?
I wonder which [w]Memory[/w] you like best!
If I understand correctly,[pause .2/] this 'FREND-43V3R' uploads decoded Memories to the Pillars inside the Vortex.
It's a bit like escorting lost people back home...
Using your Pulsor to absorb these new Memories will make you even stronger!
[f]I heard you repaired the golem![/f][pause .2/] I'm proud of you, Recruit!
I'm sure using FREND-43V3R will be crucial for the future of the Ark's inhabitants.
Now that you're one of the Leapers, I'm giving you this Rescue Fish!
It allows you to rescue survivors from the Vortex during future expeditions.
Remember, the more victims we repatriate, the more the Ark will develop.
Good luck, Grunt! [pause .2/]Come back to me if you make any more interesting discoveries.
[s]The glass is melting! [shakebox/][sh]I'M GOING TO DIE![/s][/sh]
[shakebox/][sh][s]I HOPE SOMEONE WILL GATHER MY ASHES![/s][/sh]
Any longer and someone could have served me up as hot frog's legs...
[color=757575]*Use the Rescue Fish to bring the frog back to the Ark.*[/c]
By chance, she didn't have a scratch... [pause .2/][wh]Yes...[/wh] [pause .2/]just hypoglycemia...
One of my Grunts brought you back to our island while you were unconscious.

You are no longer in danger. [pause .2/]
So, who are you? [pause .2/]
What were you doing out there?
Me?[pause .2/] I'm Sigourney, and I study the Vortex! But... it looks like fieldwork doesn't suit me[sl]â¦[/sl]
Indeed. [pause .2/]The Sentinels Factory doesn't seem like a good place to observe a Vortex...
Well, [f]think again![/f][pause .2/] I've been analyzing this phenomenon for a while.
It's the first time I've managed to get so close to the cenâ
There is hardly any wind here...
[f]That means this island has yet to feel the pull of the Vortex!?[/f]
[f]That's completely [s]CRAZY![/s][/f] That could mean this is the last island outside the Vortex!
[f]I need to study this place![pause .2/] The weather![pause .2/] The Vortex![pause .2/] It's fantastic![/f]
[f][s]NO, WAIT![pause .2/] This is very SERIOUS![/s][pause .2/] Because this island may soon be absorbed![/f]
I've observed the phenomenon several times:[pause .2/] at first,[pause .2/] your island will start getting gusts...
Then, [pause .2/]they will intensify! And they will get stronger and stronger, until the island is eventually [sh]sucked in![/sh]
[f]And then![/f][pause .2/] You will join the [w]great orbital spiral[/w] of the Vortex.
[s]But that's just the [sh]BEGINNING[/sh] of the troubles![/s] [pause .2/][f]You risk being [sh]crashed[/sh] into by other islets![/f]
[f]Even if that doesn't happen,[pause .2/] your island will start to [sh]break apart![/sh][pause .2/] It will shatter into [w]numerous pieces![/w][/f]
[f][s][sh]WORSE![/sh][/s][pause .2/] Sentinels from neighboring islands will start invading and [sh]tear you to shreds![/sh][/f]
And if you're not already dead...[pause .5/] [f][s][sh]You'll end up in the CENTER OF THE VORTEX! [/sh][/s][/f][pause/][wh]I don't know what happens in there, though.[/wh]
That's troubling...[pause .2/] Are you sure that...
Hmm... [pause .2/]Very well... [pause .5/]You can stay here. [pause .2/]We will help you with your research.
Thank you![pause .2/][f] I'm sure that by joining forces, we could find a way toâ[/f]
The Vortex pulls in a straight line.
Sigourney, follow me. [pause .2/]I'll show you where you can settle in.
Grunt, come and see me, please.
I've thought about it carefully. [pause .5/]I think [c=5B71B3]Sigourney[/c] is right: the Ark's absorption is inevitable.
You should check if she needs assistance. [pause .5/]We must help her uncover the secret of that damned Vortex.
Otherwise, all our efforts will be in vain...
I don't want to go back into that damned Vortex.
I lost my whole family there, kid.
By pure chance, [pause .2/]I'm the only one who made it out.
[f][sh]The Ark is at risk of disappearing! [/sh][wh]If we do nothing...[/wh][/f]
You must help me unravel the mystery of this Vortex. [pause .2/]I need to understand its origins and its mechanisms.
I couldn't reach the center, [pause .2/][f]but I'm certain you can![/f]
As the saying goes, [w]knowledge is power![/w]
Report to me all the strange phenomena you observe during your expeditions.
We will surely find a way to save ourselves!
Macaba has just returned. She's near the infirmary. You should go and talk to her.
[wh]I've already told her that it was a bad idea to leave corpses under a tarpaulin in the sun.[/wh]
Hello, young Leaper. [pause .5/]I'm back with a [w]fresh load![/w]
If you wish... [w]You can change bodies[/w]... [s]Yes, yes...! [/s][wh]You heard me correctly![/wh]
The resurrection machine can return you to a body of your choice...
All you have to do is choose one of my [w]findings[/w]. [wh]Yes... like this...[/wh]
I've got a dead elephant! But... [pause .5/][wh]It won't fit in the machine...[/wh]
Does one of my [w]findings[/w] catch your eye?
I REALLY need to get a bucket...
We finally got Pietro back. He'll be able to take care of team departures again!
Chat with him. [pause .2/]He's just to the right of the cannon, and he'll tell you how to team with other Leapers inside the Vortex.
You [wh][i](might)[/i][/wh] get further by collaborating with other Leapers!
Create or join a group, climb into the cannon, aim for the Vortex, and [s][sh]BOOM![/sh][/s]
I'm so lucky to be responsible for the cannon! I love the sound it makes. [s][sh]BOOOOM![/sh][/s]
I'd love to go with you! [pause/][sh][wh]But I'd probably land myself into trouble again...[/wh][/sh]
[f]One day, I'll put so many explosives in the cannon that you'll land smack in the middle of the Vortex! [/f][s][sh]BOOOOOOM![/sh][/s]
Have you ever tried to go out as part of a group?
I can put a team together for you!
Hey, [sh]PSSSST! [/sh]Are you a Leaper? Do you have a Pulsor!?
I was cleaning the inside of my cannon when the lid snapped shut!
And then, [sh]BOOM![/sh] [pause .1/]I ended up here by mistake!
Please, help me get back! [pause .1/]There are golems everywhere! I'm scared I might lose my feathers!
Could you [pause .2/]knock me out? [pause .1/]One good [sh]BOOM[/sh] will do the trick!
Yeah, I know it sounds weird like that!
I tried to launch myself from a couple of cliffs, [pause .2/]but my head is too tough!
If you do it, my Rescue Fish will activate its fins and bring me back home!
[color=757575]*Give the bird a good knock on the head.*[/c]
There is a little bit of wind today. [pause .2/]Luckily, the Vortex doesn't seem to have gotten any closer!
We must protect this little piece of paradise at all costs!
If I come down from the top of my station, does that mean it's going to rain? [pause .2/]Not at all! [pause .2/]Who said that?
With the telescope, I can almost see the Golem Gardens from here!
[wh]Based on my calculations... [pause .2/]The floating leaf in the basin made three laps...[/wh]
The Vortex looks fascinating from here! [pause .2/]And... [pause .2/]terrifying!
Thanks for helping me out earlier.
I can take care of the cannon for the Leaper teams again.
On that note, would you like to look for a team?
Kill all enemies in less than {Desc.Duration} seconds
Kill all enemies without taking damage
Would you like to equip it?
Refills 1 charge of your health flask (heals 60% of your HP).
Locked: all players must first beat the previous difficulty
There is only one hot spring every second biome
There is only one partially depleted hot spring every second biome
Send your discoveries to the Ark
It was not a will but a matter of choice.
I trieD to forgIve you. Please forgivE me.
I'm not angry. I'm still hungry.
You know I do all of this for both of us.
You should not give too much to children.

Dear guinea pigs, Welcome to the private alpha of Windblown! Before diving headfirst, please note that our game is still in development. Some features are missing or incomplete. Your experience and feedback are crucial for the game's future. We're counting on you to let us know what's not working. We already know there will be bugs that will make you laugh (or cry). But hey, that's the beauty of development, right? Get ready to dive into the cheerful chaos, and thank you for being part of this adventure with us! Motion Twin

You can help us improve the game!

We'd like to automatically collect certain data during your game sessions.

The following may be recorded:
- Data about your games
- Data about errors and crashes
- Data about your hardware
- Data about your internet connection

Access to this data will help us correct bugs and crashes more quickly and will help improve the game in general.

If you change your mind, you can modify your choice at any time in the options menu.
Allow diagnostic data to be sent

Dear guinea pigs, Welcome to the early access of Windblown! Before diving headfirst, please note that our game is still in development. Some features are missing or incomplete. Your experience and feedback are crucial for the game's future. We're counting on you to let us know what's not working. We already know there will be bugs that will make you laugh (or cry). But hey, that's the beauty of development, right? Get ready to dive into the cheerful chaos, and thank you for being part of this adventure with us! Motion Twin
This item is now available for your next expeditions!

Dear streamers, We are thrilled to have you here experiencing Windblown for the first time! Before diving headfirst, please note that our game is still in development. This demo contains some unfinished elements and only features the first 2 biomes. There will be way more when the Early Access begins! Also, if you wish to play co-op, please ensure you have the latest patch installed. Get ready to dive into the cheerful chaos of our new game, and THANK YOU ALL for being part of this adventure with us! Motion Twin P.S.: it seems that game developers are giving recommendations to streamers, so here's ours: don't put ice cubes in red wine. That's like asking for ketchup on a croissant.
Not enough Â Â  Memonites! Collect them during your expeditions!

Welcome to the Windblown single-player demo! Yes, a real demoâabout as "limited" as a mountain DSL connection! You'll get to explore the 1st biome and your village, but don't worry, there's way more coming in Early Access, and your progress will carry over! We're still ironing things out, so if your character suddenly takes flight, don't fret. It's probably a feature in the making. For your bravery, enjoy an exclusive guinea pig skin as a souvenir. Your feedback is the key to making Windblown the best game possible! We can't wait to see you on October 24th for Early Access and multiplayer. Until then, enjoy the demo! Thanks for joining us, Motion Twin
You'll be able to unlock this right at the launch of the game's Early Access, as your current save file can be carried over.
Are you sure you want to login?

Each stack increases damage dealt to the target.

Deals damage every {Asset.BurnTickCooldown}s for {Asset.BurnDuration}s. Max stacks: {Asset.BurnMaxStacks}.
For a short time after taking damage, you may recover up to 25% of the lost health by dealing weapon damage.
You heal for a portion of the damage dealt.
Dodging an attack at the last moment reflects part of the damage towards the attacking foe.

Inflicts poison damage for 4s.
Damage increases over time, up to a maximum. Reapplying poison refreshes the duration.
Targets are unable to move for the duration (degressive).
Incapacitates a target for the duration (degressive). The player that launched the effect can shatter it to deal +{Asset.FrozenBonusDmg}% damage.
Hits deal bonus damage per stack. Max hits with bonus damage: {Asset.BleedHitLimitPerSecond} per second.
